Class TableMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • rest.TableMgr

  • public class TableMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class TableMgr. This class manages and control the tables of the restaurant

      • searchList

        public int searchList(int tableId)
        Search tableList using tableID. Iterates through the tableList and return the index of the table specified by the parameter
        Parameters:
        tableId - the table id
        Returns:
        the index of the desired table in tableList

      • nextAvailableTable

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • fullUpdate

        public void fullUpdate(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> res,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> ord)
        Update overall tableList with the current reservations provided. Firstly, it resets tables marked as reserved(status == 0) as available. Subsequently, it marks the relevant tables as reserved(status == 0) as per ArrayList res.
        Parameters:
        res - List of Integer containing the tableId of reservation for current session
        res - List of Integer containing the tableId of current orders
